products.title: SS Gas Grill
products.description: An Exclusive, 3-Burner Stainless Steel Gas Grill has the features you need for a mid-size, stress-free cookout. Sufficiently sized for the family or parties, this unit features 450-square-inches of primary cooking space coupled with Char-Broil TRU-Infrared technology, which prevents flare-ups, delivers even-heat and cooks juicier food. Also features a 150 square inch swing-away warming rack for indirect cooking. Effortlessly cook for friends and family with ease and confidence. Porcelain-coated grates are durable, rust-resistant and easy-to-clean, while the electronic ignition offers reliable push-to-start operation. 24, 000-BTU's across the three main burners and also features a 10, 000-BTU side burner, ideal for sauces and sides. Lid-mounted temperature gauge so you can easily monitor the inside temperature of your grill and two wheels for increased mobility. Assembly required, measures 54. 1-inches W x 23. 4-inches D x 45. 5-inches H, and weighs about 98 lbs.

products.title: Flat Top Gas Grill Griddle
products.description: 2 Burner 28 in. Gas Griddle in Classic Black is perfect for crowds big and small. With a surface big enough to fit 44 hot dogs, youÆll be amazed by this 34,000 BTU powerhouse! Built with industrial materials for durability and optimal heat distribution. Now with the rear grease management system for no-mess cooking and easy cleanup. Cook anything, anytime, anywhere!

products.title: Portable Charcoal Grill
products.description: It offers the perfect solution for all your OTG grilling needs. This compact little grill is lightweight & easy to transport but still offers over 150 square Of grilling space - enough to grill for the entire family or the carload at the big game. The firebox is enamel coated - giving it strength & durability to survive the harshest grilling conditions. The dual venting system helps control the heat so you can cook slow & low or up at searing hot temperatures. For added convenience, the lid is secured by 3 durable locks, & the ash tray is accessible for easy clean-up.
